attributes.action: Stop this obsession with waiting lists and let people be able to book an apointment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This drive to eliminate waiting lists is insane. How are people supposed to book time off for hospital treatment when they have little advanced warning of their treatment/surgery dates. Also how is someone able to get a job if they tell their prospective employer i need an operation but i don't know when it will be.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
